semantics.label: Tekst uvoda
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the summary task.

fields.label: List of statements for the summary - the first statement is correct.

semantics.label: Pozadinska zamućenost za elemente za uzimanje

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Text displayed before number of statements solved in the summary task.
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the statements. Example: 'Progress: 2/5'

semantics.label: Text displayed before number of wrong statements selected in the summary task.
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the statements. Example: 'Wrong answers: 4'

semantics.label: Summary feedback header
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the summary feedback.
